version_description: Exceptional PeakVisor 3D Maps are even better now! Higher precision landscape model and WAY farther rendering are at your disposal. Now, you can switch between satellite and topographic styles right on the 3D Maps screen (no need to change it from the settings).

There are thousands of summit registers all over the world and more than a million mountains. They allow leaving a text note to those who climbs the mountain after you. Today more than a million virtual summit registers have been added to all the summits. Climb the mountain and leave your message to those who will follow after you!

Let the challenge begin! Check-in at summits, mountain passes, lakes, and mountain huts with the PeakVisor app. Build your adventure profiles, participate in challenges, and get to the tops of your favorite peaks, both virtually and in real life.

The app’s newest peak bagging feature is a social experience and a way for you to keep track of your outdoor achievements. Try it out and start tracking all your favorite mountains as you travel to new heights with the app.

The app’s newest peak bagging feature is a social experience and a way for you to keep track of your outdoor achievements. Try it out and start tracking all your favorite mountains as you travel to new heights with the app.

In this release there was no significant changes but we are bringing important internal updates to get ready for a major breakthrough in the next month or so. But those, attentive to the details might notice small usability improvements, e.g. tapping on a town name as the teleport destination in search, (very) small performance boost is also here, 3D maps are (very) little nicer now. Oh, and we’ve fixed a couple of nasty bugs, such as check ins restoring after reinstall.
Automatic alignment on 2x zoom has been fixed, better and more reliable region photos, and other minor usability fixes.

Automatic alignment on 2x zoom has been fixed, better and more reliable region photos, and other minor usability fixes.
And a crash fix in resources parsing.
